captions.text: - Well you should definitely talk to her.

- She's cheatin' on ya
bro. Drop her. Right?
- You want to take me out tonight,

- Personally, I love being
one of the many girls
I mean, it gets you what you want.
Also, we're usually the ones who decide
where the group of friends is gonna eat
- No, no, no, let's get Chinese food.

- No, Chinese food sounds
good right now so--
- Uh, stop it. We are getting Mexican.

But sometimes, you can
rub people the wrong way.
- Chris, you gotta take that hat off man.
New Years was like two weeks ago. Come on.
My dead grandmother gave me this hat.

- And uh, sometimes, it
can get you into trouble.

- Guys, we just had a
crazy year this year.
- But people trust us for the truth.
- And when we do get what we want,

with people who appreciate
us the way we are.
- and you're gonna meet my friends.
- Don't tell me what I'm gonna do.
- Well it's not a big deal.
and you're gonna meet my friends.
And we're the kind of people
Martin Luther King Day off this year.

Martin Luther King did
not die for our sins
so that we could work on his birthday.

- I don't know. I just want
the day off. So let's hear it.
- Okay. Okay. You guys have the day off.
The world needs people like you.
Otherwise, how would we get anything done?

- I think we should
still get Chinese food.

- Eugene Lee Yang, we
are getting Mexican food.

not my fault. Go Quinta!﻿
